title: Challenger Jungle/AD player LF a team :)
body:
I have been looking forward to joining a team because I love the aspect of team play in league and feel I am great at working within a group, I got to Challenger playing Fill but mostly excelling at jungle or ad. Just add me on league under Syouran or comment bellow if you are looking for a player for your team :) 

{{sticker:galio-happy}}

replies.body: We are a d5+ team. If you're interested in joining us as a jungler please add me or STS Cola
